Detailed Description

DTSTAT -- Print a status summary of the DTS network.

Usage: dtstat [options]

Options: -h print help

-c <cfg> specify the config file to use -p <port> specify server port

-e [<N>] number of errors to print -q <name> queue name -s print one-line summary only -t target machine

-v verbose

Author:
Mike Fitzpatrick, NOAO
Date:
July 2010
